comment.shortText:
Represents a "container" of components, singletons, and services. This is the main
entrypoint to Lilith, this is your creation tool to create your application! **(\*≧∀≦\*)**

Represents a "container" of components, singletons, and services. This is the main
entrypoint to Lilith, this is your creation tool to create your application! **(\*≧∀≦\*)**
The component tree for this [[Container]]
The services tree for this [[Container]]
The singleton tree for this [[Container]]
Returns a reference from the component, singleton, or service tree

tags.text: The reference by class (it'll return `typeof <ref>`, use the second generic to return the class)

comment.shortText: Applies a component to this [[Container]]
Applies a service to this [[Container]]
Registers a singleton to this [[Container]]
Bulk-add a list of singletons
Disposes this [[Container]]
Emits a new event from the callstack
comment.returns: A boolean value if it exists or not

comment.shortText: Finds a component, service, or singleton by a specific `predicate` function
comment.returns: The component, service, singleton found or `null` if nothing was found

comment.text: The predicate function to find the component, service, or singleton's constructor type or name

comment.shortText: Injects all pending references to the target class
Initializes all components, services, and singletons.
Pushes a new event to the callstack

Pushes a new event to the callstack and removes it after
it has been emitted from the parent component.
Removes all listeners from this EventBus component
Pushes a event's specific listener from the callstack.
Runs all injections for all components and services
Sets the maximum amount of listeners to append

comment.text:
The max size to use, If value `-1` is used, it'll
be infinite and might lead to callstack errors.

comment.shortText: Returns how many listeners a event has
comment.returns: A number of how many concurrent listeners are in

comment.shortText: Returns how many events are in this EventBus component
Represents the options for using a Component
List of children or an absolute path to load in children
The name of the component
The priority to load the component
Class decorator to mark the target class as a component
Decorator to inject a component, service, or singleton into
List of children or an absolute path to load in children
The name of the component
The priority to load the component
Class decorator to mark the target class as a service
Returns the current version of @augu/lilith

comment.shortText: List of metadata keys available, this is not exported in Lilith itself.

Represents a base component; typed for [[Application.components]].
You can inject singletons, services, and components.
List of children attached to this [[BaseComponent]] as it's parent
The name of the component
The priority of this [[BaseComponent]]

Represents the type for this [[BaseComponent]]. It's always
gonna be `component`, just here for simplicity

Represents a base service; typed for [[Application.services]].
You can inject singletons, services, and components.
List of children attached to this [[BaseService]] as it's parent
The name of the service
The priority of this [[BaseService]]

Represents the type for this [[BaseService]]. It's always
gonna be `service`, just here for simplicity
Represents a singleton that is registered into Lilith
The reference to the singleton itself
The singleton's key, just a random scribble of words.
The type for this [[BaseSingleton]]. It'll always default to `'singleton'`.
Represents the pending injections from all classes
The inferred reference to inject
The property key
The target class
Represents the definition of a referred object
List of children or an absolute path to load in children
The name of this [[ReferredObjectDefinition]]

A number to show if this referred object should be initialized
first or list, like a priority tree
The type of this [[ReferredObjectDefintion]]
Type alias to represented the return value of `require()` or `import()`
